name: ariaLabel
description: The aria label of the button. Needs to be present if the button doesn't have a visible label.

name: disabled
description: Determines if the button is disabled.

name: gapSize
description: The gap size between content elements of the button.

name: href
description: The href if the `type` is set to `a'.

name: justifyContent
description: The alignment of the button content.

name: showSpinner
description: Determines if a spinner should be shown inside the button.

name: submit
description: The type of the button element. Only takes effect if the `type` is set to `button`.

name: target
description: The target of the button if the `type` is set to `a`.

name: to
description: The route location if the `type` is set to `router-link`.

name: type
description: The type of the button element.

name: noHover
description: Determines if the button should have no hover effect.
